channel.title: Wisdom on stultus notes

item.title: 9-1-1 (TV Series)
item.description: Wisdom and insights from the 9-1-1 TV series on decision-making and resilience.

item.title: Flexibility Over Rigidity
item.description: Resilience comes from flexibility, not rigidity - like redwoods that bend with the wind.

item.title: Right No vs Wrong Yes
item.description: Sometimes the right kind of No is better than the wrong kind of Yes.
